sect2.title: Linux/Unix
sect2.para: For compilation of each package, run the following commands in Numerics/Kernel/FrontEnd directories:
Default installation path is /usr/local. To change that, type ./configure --prefix=/your/install/path
Warning: depending on the installation path, you might be root to run make install.
To run tests: ./autogen.sh ./configure --enable-cppunit make make install make check
To generate Doxygen documentation: make doc
